Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>. I will praise<S>3034</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> with my whole heart<S>3824</S>, in the assembly<S>5475</S> of the upright<S>3477</S>, and in the congregation<S>5712</S>. <sup>Praise ye: Heb. Hallelujah</sup>
The works<S>4639</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> are great<S>1419</S>, sought out<S>1875</S> of all them that have pleasure<S>2656</S> therein.
His work<S>6467</S> is honourable<S>1935</S> and glorious<S>1926</S>: and his righteousness<S>6666</S> endureth<S>5975</S> for ever<S>5703</S>.
He hath made<S>6213</S> his wonderful works<S>6381</S> to be remembered<S>2143</S>: the LORD<S>3068</S> is gracious<S>2587</S> and full of compassion<S>7349</S>.
He hath given<S>5414</S> meat<S>2964</S> unto them that fear<S>3373</S> him: he will ever<S>5769</S> be mindful<S>2142</S> of his covenant<S>1285</S>. <sup>meat: Heb. prey</sup>
He hath shewed<S>5046</S> his people<S>5971</S> the power<S>3581</S> of his works<S>4639</S>, that he may give<S>5414</S> them the heritage<S>5159</S> of the heathen<S>1471</S>.
The works<S>4639</S> of his hands<S>3027</S> are verity<S>571</S> and judgment<S>4941</S>; all his commandments<S>6490</S> are sure<S>539</S>.
They stand fast<S>5564</S> for ever<S>5703</S> and ever<S>5769</S>, and are done<S>6213</S> in truth<S>571</S> and uprightness<S>3477</S>. <sup>stand: Heb. are established</sup>
He sent<S>7971</S> redemption<S>6304</S> unto his people<S>5971</S>: he hath commanded<S>6680</S> his covenant<S>1285</S> for ever<S>5769</S>: holy<S>6918</S> and reverend<S>3372</S> is his name<S>8034</S>.
The fear<S>3374</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> is the beginning<S>7225</S> of wisdom<S>2451</S>: a good<S>2896</S> understanding<S>7922</S> have all they that do<S>6213</S> his commandments: his praise<S>8416</S> endureth<S>5975</S> for ever<S>5703</S>. <sup>a good: or, good success</sup> <sup>his commandments: Heb. them</sup>
